thread.section_title: Novotel London Tower Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Nice Stay
thread.title_full: Very Nice Stay - Review of Novotel London Tower Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph-2000-2000
title: Very Nice Stay
text: We enjoyed very much our stay in this hotel. Staff at hotel was very kind and helpful. We had a good view on the Tower and the Tower Bridge (even though only the top part was visible because covered by the Tower). The hotel was conveniently close to the underground station "Tower Gateway". The restaurant of the hotel was great: good food and good team.
